poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
I'm Dashiell Hammett
Played by Jason Robards
In that shack on stilts in salt grass.
Looking up from my printy underwood
In the conjunctival glow
At the jowl-grey ocean winter night is working on
There's a face like fizz in the glass
From family Christmas dinner snaps:
Hello, granpa.
